name: Deathless Initiate
prerequisiteFormula: @str_score >= 13 AND @con_score >= 13 AND (@race:orc OR @race:half_orc) AND @feat:diehard AND @ability:endurance#ranger AND @bab >= 6
descriptionText: For you, impending death is a call to wrath.
benefitText: You are not staggered while using the Diehard feat, but if you take a move and a standard action or a fullround action while you are at 0 or fewer hit points you take 1 point of damage. Further, while using the Diehard feat, you gain a +2 bonus on melee attacks and damage rolls.
